title: Zoom-out in Quorum Blocks
description: Use the zoom-out tool to make the blocks smaller, then go to the next problem.
hint: You can use the mouse or the keyboard to press the third button on the toolbar. When using the keyboard, use TAB to go to the zoom out button and press ENTER. There is also a shortcut key of CTRL + '-' that can be used when you are working in the block editor.
